chinese:
抬头的一片天 是男儿的一片天
曾经在满天的星光下 做梦的少年
english:
The sky when he raised his head was a young man's sky
Once, under a sky full of stars, a dreaming youth

chinese:
不知道天多高 不知道海多远
却发誓要带着你远走 到海角天边
english:
Not knowing how high the sky, nor how far the seas
But vowing to take you far away, to ends of the sea and sky

chinese:
不负责任的誓言 年少轻狂的我
在黑暗中迷失 才发现自己的脆弱
english:
The irresponsible oath, the conceited youth I was
Lost in darkness, only then I discovered my frailty

chinese:
看着你哭红的眼睛 想着远离的家门
满天的星星请为我 点盏希望的灯火
english:
Seeing your eyes red from tears, thinking of home far away
Stars filling the sky, please ignite for me the lights of hope

chinese:
星星点灯 照亮我的家门
让迷失的孩子 找到来时的路
english:
Stars alight, illuminate my home
Let the lost children find the path back home

chinese:
星星点灯 照亮我的前程
用一点光 温暖孩子的心
english:
Stars alight, illuminating my journey ahead
With a bit of light, warm a child's heart

chinese:
现在的一片天 是肮脏的一片天
星星在文明的天空里 再也看不见
english:
Now, that sky is a dirty sky
The stars, in the skies of civilization, can't be seen anymore

chinese:
天其实并不高 海其实也不远
人心其实比天高 比海更遥远
english:
The sky is actually not so high, nor the seas so far
The human heart is actually higher than the sky, farther than the seas

chinese:
学会骗人的谎言 追逐名利的我
在现实中迷失 才发现自己的脆弱
english:
Learning to deceive with lies, the I who pursued fame and profit
Lost in my life, only then I discovered my frailty

chinese:
看着你含泪的离去 想着茫茫的前程
远方的星星请为我 点盏希望的灯火
english:
Watching you as you left with tears in your eyes, thinking of the vast, uncertain future
Stars far away, please ignite for me the lights of hope

chinese:
多年以后 一场大雨惊醒沉睡的我
突然之间 都市的霓虹都不再闪烁
english:
Many years later, a bout of heavy rain snapped awake the I who was deeply asleep
All of a sudden, the city's neon lights flickered no more

chinese:
天边有颗模糊的星光偷偷探出了头
是你的眼神依旧在远方为我在等候
english:
In the sky there was a blurred star's light stealthily popped out its head
It was the expression in your eyes, still waiting for me far away

chinese:
你挑着担 我牵着马
迎来日出 送走晚霞
english:
You carry the luggage, I lead the horse
We welcome the sunrise, and see off the sunset clouds

chinese:
踏平坎坷成大道
斗罢艰险又出发 又出发
english:
We tread flat the bumpy path into a great road
After fighting the hardships and perils we set off again

chinese:
一番番春秋冬夏
一场场酸甜苦辣
english:
Time after time, spring, fall, winter, summer
Time after time, the sour and sweet, the bitter and spicy

chinese: 敢问路在何方 路在脚下
english: May I ask where the road is? The road is underfoot

chinese:
你挑着担 我牵着马
翻山涉水 两肩霜花
english:
You carry the luggage, I lead the horse
Crossing mountains and waters, frost forms on our shoulders

chinese:
风云雷电任叱吒
一路豪歌响天涯 响天涯
english:
The wind and clouds, thunder and lightning, let it roar
A heroic song all the way echoes to sky's ends

chinese:
从那遥远海边，慢慢消失的你，
本来模糊的脸，竟然渐渐清晰。
english:
From that distant seashore, you're slowly fading away
Your originally blurred face, actually becomes gradually clear

chinese:
想要说些什么，又不知从何说起，
只有把它放在心底。
english:
I wanna say some things, but I don't know where to start
I can only leave it in the bottom of my heart

chinese:
茫然走在海边，看那潮来潮去，
徒劳无功，想把每朵浪花记清，
english:
Absently walking by the sea, I see the waves come and go
Working to no avail, I try to remember clearly each ocean spray

chinese:
想要说声爱你，却被吹散在风里。
茫然回头，你在那里。
english:
I want to say I love you, but it's dispersed by the wind
I look back blankly, you are there

chinese:
如果大海能够，唤回曾经的爱。
就让我用一生等待。
english:
If the great sea could bring back past love
Then let me use a lifetime to wait

chinese:
如果深情往事，你已不再留恋。
就让它随风飘远。
english:
If to our deep love and past, you're no longer attached
Then let it flutter away in the wind

chinese:
如果大海能够，带走我的哀愁。
就象带走每条河流。
english:
If the great sea could carry away my sorrow
Like it does each river flow

chinese:
所有受过的伤，所有流过的泪。
我的爱……
请全部带走。
english:
All the wounds I've endured, all the tears I've cried
My love...
Please carry it all away

chinese:
轻轻的我将离开你
请将眼角的泪拭去
english:
Quietly, I will leave you
Please wipe the tears from your eyes

chinese:
漫漫长夜里未来日子里
亲爱的你别为我哭泣
english:
In the long nights and days to come
My love, don't weep for me

chinese:
前方的路虽然太凄迷
请在笑容里为我祝福
english:
Though the road ahead is too bleak and muddled
Please wish me well in your smile

chinese:
虽然迎着风虽然下着雨
我在风雨之中恋着你
english:
Even if facing the wind, even if it rains
I'll yearn for you in wind and rain

chinese:
没有你的日子里
我会更加珍惜自己
english:
In the days without you
I will take better care of myself

chinese:
没有我的岁月里
你要保重你自己
english:
In the years without me
Please take care of yourself

chinese:
你问我何时归故里
我也轻声的问自己
english:
You ask when I'll return home
I also quietly ask myself

chinese:
不是在此时不知在何时
我想大约会是在冬季
english:
Not right now, I don't know when
I think around winter

chinese:
醉春风
我醉春风
english:
Drunk spring wind
I'm drunk in the spring wind

chinese:
初次见面 两人齐齐心动
情网中看不一样的天空
english:
On the first encounter, our two hearts beat as one
In the snare of love, I see a different sky

chinese:
我张开心胸
无情的人笑我痴
我笑无情的人懵懂
english:
I open my heart
The heartless laugh at my foolishness
I laugh at their ignorance

chinese: 我愿意在她手掌之中
english: I am willing to be in the palm of her hand

chinese:
忍了冲动 她又让我感动
伤她心我是万万不能
english:
I endured my urge, she again makes me impassioned
To injure her heart, I absolutely must not

chinese:
不要坏我大义
我会倚天屠龙
english:
Don't ruin my justice
I will rely on the heavens to slay dragons

chinese:
但愿情义交融
让我有始有终
english:
I wish to join in comradeship
Let me have a beginning and end

source: 月亮代表我的心 (邓丽君)
chinese:
你问我爱你有多深 我爱你有几分
我的情也真 我的爱也真
月亮代表我的心
english:
You ask how deeply I love you, how much I love you
My feelings are true, my love is true
The moon represents my heart

source: 月亮代表我的心 (邓丽君)
chinese:
你问我爱你有多深 我爱你有几分
我的情不移 我的爱不变
月亮代表我的心
english:
You ask how deeply I love you, how much I love you
My feelings are unwavering, my love unchanging
The moon represents my heart

source: 月亮代表我的心 (邓丽君)
chinese:
轻轻的一个吻 已经打动我的心
深深的一段情 教我思念到如今
english:
Gently a single kiss, already moved my heart
Deeply a period of love, has caused me to yearn until now

source: 月亮代表我的心 (邓丽君)
chinese:
你问我爱你有多深 我爱你有几分
你去想一想 你去看一看
月亮代表我的心
english:
You ask how deeply I love you, how much I love you
Go ponder it, and take a look
The moon represents my heart

chinese: 简单点 说话的方式简单点
english: A bit simpler, make the way you speak a bit simpler

chinese:
递进的情绪请省略
你又不是个演员
别设计那些情节
english:
Please omit the staged progression of moods
You are not an actor
Don't create those plots

chinese:
没意见 我只想看看你怎么圆
你难过的太表面 像没天赋的演员
观众一眼能看见
english:
No objections, I only want to see how you justify
Your distress is too superficial, like a talentless actor
The audience, with a single glance, can see through it

chinese:
该配合你演出的我演视而不见
在逼一个最爱你的人即兴表演
什么时候我们开始收起了底线
english:
Obliged to put on an act with you, I pretend not to see
You are forcing the one who loves you most to improvise a performance
When did we begin to put away the bottom line of decency

chinese: 顺应时代的改变 看那些拙劣的表演
english: Conforming to the changing times, watching those inept performances

chinese:
可你曾经那么爱我 干嘛演出细节
我该变成什么样子 才能延缓厌倦
english:
But you once loved me so, why dramatize trivial details?
What kind of character should I change into, that I can delay the weariness?

chinese:
原来当爱放下防备后的这些那些
才是考验
english:
It turns out, after love lets down its guard, these and those things
Are the true test

chinese:
没意见 你想怎样我都随便
你演技也有限
又不用说感言
分开就平淡些
english:
No objections, whatever you want it's fine with me
Your acting skill is limited
There's no need for an emotional speech
If we separated it'd just be more bland

chinese:
该配合你演出的我 演视而不见
别逼一个最爱你的人 即兴表演
什么时候我们开始 没有了底线
english:
Obliged to put on an act with you, I pretend not to see
Don't force the one who loves you most to improvise a performance
When did we begin to have no bottom line of decency

chinese: 顺着别人的谎言被动就不显得可怜
english: If we follow the lies of others passively, then we don't appear pitiful

chinese:
原来当爱放下防备后的这些那些
都有个期限
english:
It turns out, after love lets down its guard, these and those things
All have a time limit

chinese:
其实台下的观众就我一个
其实我也看出你有点不舍
场景也习惯我们来回拉扯
还计较着什么
english:
Actually, the audience off stage is only me
Actually, I can also see that you're a little unwilling
The scene is also accustomed to us pulling back and forth
What are we still bickering about?

chinese:
其实说分不开的也不见得
其实感情最怕的就是拖着
越演到重场戏越哭不出了
是否还值得
english:
Actually, for those who say they can't part it's not necessarily so
Actually, what affection is most unable to endure is dragging on
The closer the performance approaches the climax the harder it is to cry
Is it still worth it?

chinese:
该配合你演出的我尽力在表演
像情感节目里的嘉宾任人挑选
english:
Obliged to put on an act with you, I am trying my best to perform
Like a guest in those emotional reality shows selected by the host

chinese:
如果还能看出我有爱你的那面
请剪掉那些情节 让我看上去体面
english:
If you can still see the part of me that loves you
Please cut away those plots, let me appear dignified

chinese:
可你曾经那么爱我干嘛演出细节
不在意的样子是我最后的表演
是因为爱你我才选择表演 这种成全
english:
But you once loved me so, why dramatize trivial details?
My facade of not caring is my last performance
It's because I love you that I choose to put on an act, this kind of enabling

chinese:
天地悠悠过客匆匆
潮起又潮落
english:
The heaven and earth are enduring, passerby are fleeting
The tide rises and the tide falls

chinese: 恩恩怨怨生死白头几人能看透
english: Gratitude and grudges, life and death, a head of white hair, how many people can see through it?

chinese:
红尘啊滚滚痴痴啊情深
聚散终有时
english:
Oh mundane world surge on, how foolish passions deep
There will be a time we meet and part for the last time

chinese:
留一半清醒留一半醉
至少梦里有你追随
english:
Leave half a clear mind, leave half a drunk one
At least in dreams I have you for company

chinese:
我拿青春赌明天
你用真情换此生
english:
I gamble my youth for tomorrow
You convert your true passions into this life

chinese:
岁月不知人间多少的忧伤
何不潇洒走一回
english:
Throughout the years who knows how much sorrow there is in human life?
Why not walk unfettered once?

chinese:
甜蜜蜜你笑得甜蜜蜜
好像花儿开在春风里
开在春风里
english:
Honey sweet, your smile is honey sweet
Like flowers blooming in the springtime wind
Blooming in the springtime wind

chinese:
在哪里在哪里见过你
你的笑容这样熟悉
english:
Where oh where, where have I seen you
Your smile is so familiar

chinese:
我一时想不起
啊~~在梦里
梦里梦里见过你
english:
At once I can't recall
Ah, in my dreams
In dreams, in dreams I've seen you

chinese:
甜蜜笑得多甜蜜
是你~是你~梦见的就是你
english:
Honey sweet, your smile is so honey-sweet
It's you, it's you, the one I've seen in my dreams is you

chinese:
就叫，小黑吧
啊？就定啦？
我叫小白，它叫小黑，不好么？
太随便了吧
难道我的名字也是你们随便起的
仔细想想，罗小黑这名字还蛮有深度的
english:
So, let's call him, Xiaohei (Little Black)
Ah? Just like that?
I'm called Xiaobai (Little White), he's called Xiaohei, isn't it good?
Isn't it too casual?
Could it be that my name was also casually chosen by you guys?
Now that I think about it, this name "Luo Xiaohei" is quite profound

chinese:
醒了
嗨
诶？
你吓到它了
english:
He woke up
Hi
Ei?
You scared him

chinese:
小黑
不要怕哦
出来吧
对不起
english:
Xiaohei
Don't be afraid
Come out
Sorry

chinese:
妈妈！盘子呢？
不知道啊，不是我呀
我知道呀，难道是被小黑拖进去了
不会吧，你过去看看？
不会有什么吧
唔？
它出来了
什么情况？
english:
Mom! Where's the plate?
I don't know, it wasn't me
I know, could it be it was dragged in by Xiaohei?
No way... go take a look?
There's no way there's something there right?
Wu?
He came out
What the heck?

chinese:
怎么突然这么乖了
刚才一定是被你吓到了
english:
Why's he suddenly so well-behaved?
A moment ago he must've been spooked by you

chinese:
它的舌头是蓝色的呢
猫的舌头是蓝色的么？
我怎么知道
好了
english:
His tongue is blue
Are the tongues of cats blue?
How should I know?
All done

chinese:
明天要去买猫砂和猫砂盆哦
啊？那是什么呀？
就是猫猫的厕所啦
不能在卫生间么？
你找只能蹲马桶的猫给我看看
哝
嗯？
喵～
english:
Tomorrow we have to go buy cat litter and a cat litter box
Ah? What's that?
It's the cat's toilet
Can't he use the bathroom?
Find me a cat that can use use a human toilet for me to see
See?
En?
Meow

chinese:
你一定不是一只普通的猫
你到底是从哪里来的呢？
english:
You are definitely not an ordinary cat
Where in the world did you come from?

chinese:
你这么乖
主人应该很喜欢你吧？
恩
一定是因为不得已的原因
才离开你的
english:
You are so well-behaved
Your owner must've really liked you right?
En
It must've been for some reason against their will
That they left you

chinese:
从此以后
我就是你的主人咯
english:
From now on
I'm your owner

chinese:
我叫罗小白
请多多指教啦
小黑同学
english:
I'm called Luo Xiaobai
Please take care of me
Classmate Xiaohei

chinese:
小，小黑？
其实，我是一个被诅咒的王子
谢谢你帮我解开诅咒
是因为我亲你么？
是的
好没创意啊～
english:
Xiao, Xiaohei?
The truth is, I'm a prince who was cursed
Thank you for helping me remove the curse
Is it because I kissed you?
Yes
How uncreative~

chinese:
今天晚上，愿意去我城堡么？
我要好好答谢你～
不行呢，明天还要上课呢～
那我周末来接你
哈哈哈哈，好啊
english:
Tonight, would you like to come to my castle?
I'd like to properly express my thanks to you
I can't, I still have to go to class tomorrow
Then I'll come pick you up on the weekend
Hahahaha, okay

chinese:
谛听，天明珠被盗，你可知罪？
谛听知罪
谛听，一定会寻回天明珠
茫茫人海，谈何容易
那妖怪中了我一击，被我打回原形
因该就在附近
好吧，一定要带回来
是
english:
Diting, the Dawn Pearl was stolen, do you know your guilt?
Diting knows his guilt
Diting will definitely recover the Dawn Pearl
In the vast sea of people, it's easier said than done
That monster received one of my attacks, and was beaten back into his true form
He should be near
Very well, you must recover it
Yes

chinese:
西边的太阳快要落山了
微山湖上静悄悄
english:
The westward sun is soon to fall below the mountains
The Weishan Lake is utterly silent

chinese:
弹起我心爱的土琵琶
唱起那动人的歌谣
english:
Play my beloved indigenous pipa
Sing that moving ballad

chinese:
爬上飞快的火车
像骑上奔驰的骏马
车站和铁道线上
是我们杀敌的好战场
english:
Climb up the flying-fast train
Like riding a galloping steed
On the rail stations and railway lines
Is a good battlefield for killing our enemies

chinese:
我们扒飞车那个搞机枪
撞火车那个炸桥梁
就像把钢刀插入敌胸膛
打得鬼子魂飞胆丧
english:
We climb the flying vehicle, that one mans the machine guns
Crashing trains, that exploding bridge
It's just like thrusting a steel knife into the enemy's chest
Beating the devils so that their souls scatter and their courage is lost

chinese:
西边的太阳就要落山了
鬼子的末日就要来到
english:
The westward sun is about to fall below the mountains
The devils' judgment day is coming

chinese: 恭喜老爷 贺喜老爷
english: Congratulations lord

chinese:
我妈又生了，诶
诶，你妈又生了个什么呀
大姐 妈又生了
诶，生了个龙还是凤啊
english:
My mom gave birth again, ei
Ei, what did your mom give birth to?
Eldest sister, mom gave birth again
Ei, is it a dragon (male) or a phoenix (female)

chinese:
妈又生什么了
妈 妈 妈
你别老是妈妈的
说生龙还是凤
妈，妈又生了十条牛
english:
What did mom give birth to
Mom mom mom
Don't just keep saying "mom mom"
Tell me, did she give birth to a dragon (male) or phoenix (female)?
Mom, mom gave birth to 10 cows again (the bride price in their family is 10 cows)

chinese:
二姐 我们不用打进冷宫咯
就是 我们不用打进冷宫了
english:
Second eldest sister, we don't need to be thrown into the cold palace
That's right, we won't be deserted

chinese:
你妈也真不争气 害得我爹
猴崽子 我妈生什么
关你爹屁事
english:
Your mom is is too disappointing, causing my dad
Monkey brat, what my mom gives birth to
How the hell does that concern your dad

chinese:
生龙 你还不住手 你也太过分了
爹说过 不准跟少林小子眉来眼去
不准对歌 不准讲话
你们不服 跟爹说去
english:
Shenglong, why don't you stop? You're going too far
Dad said: don't flirt with Shaolin boys
No singing with them, no talking with them
If you all have a problem with that, go take it up with dad

chinese:
假小子 你别拿着鸡毛当令箭
男人婆
english:
Tomboy, don't wave a chicken feather as a token of authority
Tomboy

chinese:
拉，拉，拉吧她拉下水
打她 我们少林派不能输给裤裆派
english:
Pull, pull, pull her into the water
Fight her! We Shaolin sect can't lose to the Kudang sect

chinese:
有本事一起过来吧
本少爷不怕
少爷 她是少爷 笑死人了
她说她是少爷 就是少了一点儿
english:
If you have the guts then come at me all together
This young master (male) is unafraid
Young master, she's a young master, I'm laughing to death
She says she's a young master, but she's just missing a little something

chinese:
好
好男不跟女斗 快放手吧
不能放手
一放手我们少林派就输给裤裆派了
对对对 不能放手
english:
Well done
Good men don't fight with women, let's let it go
We can't let it go
If we let it go then we Shaolin sect will have lost to the Kudang sect
Right, we can't let it go

chinese:
三龙哥来了
好 给我们出口气 好
english:
Brother Sanlong has arrived
Bravo, he got revenge for us

chinese:
唐伯虎 这招叫什么呀
这叫游龙戏凤
english:
Tang Bohu, what's this move called?
It's called the swimming dragon messes with the phoenix

chinese:
三姐 小心
哎呀 好
哼 谁让你拍马屁
english:
Third eldest sister, be careful
Aiya, nice!
Hmph, who asked for your ass-kissing

chinese:
哈哈 这是不是裤裆派的绝招 “四脚朝天啊”
不对 这叫 “树倒猢狲散”
english:
Haha, is this the Kudang sect's ultimate skill "four legs facing the sky"
No, this is called "monkeys fall from the tree"

chinese:
水晶宫 乐无穷 猛龙唤雨又呼风
自由自在任遨游
飞上天空画彩虹 画彩虹
english:
The crystal palace, boundless cheer, the ferocious dragon summons rain and wind
Free and unrestrained, traveling wherever he pleases
Flying up to the sky, painting a rainbow

chinese:
凤非凤 龙非龙
龙眉龙眼龙鼻孔
露出尾巴不像龙
是什么呀
原来啊 原来是只凤
原来是只凤
对面河边一只凤 像个可怜虫
像个可怜虫
english:
A phoenix (female) but not, a dragon (male) but not
Dragon eyebrows, dragon eyes, dragon nostrils
The exposed tail doesn't look dragon-like
What is it?
As it turns out, as it turns out it was a phoenix
As it turns out it was a phoenix
In front, on the river bank is a phoenix, resembling a pitiful worm
Resembling a pitiful worm

chinese:
山鸡哪能飞上天
虾米哪能坐龙宫
三姐 他们是不是在唱你
不许听
笑死你的小祖宗
english:
How can a pheasant fly up to the sky?
How can a shrimp sit in the dragon palace?
Third eldest sister, are they singing about you
Don't listen
Your little ancestor is laughing to death

chinese:
三姐 他们明明是在唱你
这么坏 我回敬他几句 哎
不许唱
english:
Third eldest sister, they're clearly singing about you
They're so nasty, I'll return a few verses, ei
Don't sing

chinese:
这包当归你明天送去给凤妈
算是咱们一点心意
她妈又生凤 我们还
哎 难道生龙才要补身吗
english:
This bag of female ginseng, send it to Mrs. Feng tomorrow
It can be considered a bit of our concern for her
Her mother gave birth to a phoenix (female) again, and we still
Ai, don't tell me that a person only needs to supplement their body when they give birth to a dragon (male)?

chinese:
鲍笙凤生不出龙
要十条牛才能换他一只凤
english:
Bao Shengfeng can't birth a dragon (male)
Only with 10 cows can we exchange for a phoenix (female) from him (the bride price is 10 cows)

chinese:
我们辛辛苦苦的捱了十年
才存了三条半牛
english:
We painstakingly endured 10 years
And we only saved up for 3 and a half cows

chinese: 哼 分明是难为我们
english: Hmph, he's clearly making things difficult for us

chinese:
只要肯捱 总会有这一天
你看 这半年我们又存够一条牛腿了
english:
As long as we are willing to endure, there will surely be a day
Look, this half-year we saved enough for another cow leg

chinese:
就算你有了十条牛
那我的十条牛要等到哪年
等我们有了十条牛 你先娶二凤吧
你 这我能干得出来吗
english:
Even if you have 10 cows (for the bride price)
Then how many years must I wait for my 10 cows?
When we have 10 cows, how about you first marry Erfeng
You! How can I do such a thing?

chinese:
真蠢 牛都不会画
你干什么
牛是四只脚的么
你懂个屁
english:
So dumb, can't even draw a cow
What are you doing?
Don't cows have four feet?
What the hell do you know?

chinese:
哎呀
屁股 屁股
来来来
真是的
english:
Aiya
My butt, my butt
Come
Seriously

chinese:
诶 露出屁股 还有梅花点儿哪 
还笑
一点儿同情心都没有
谁叫你画牛添足呢
还有个小尾巴
还不练功去
诶 走走走
english:
Ei, the butt's exposed, and there are plum blossom dots 
Still laughing?
You don't have even a bit of a sympathetic heart
Who made you add a foot to the cow paining?
There's a small tail, too
Still haven't gone to practice?
Let's go

chinese:
美人照镜
美人儿
停 这招叫什么
美人儿照镜啊
照镜 照镜是这样的吗
哼 古灵古怪的什么都学
english:
Beauty reflected in the mirror
Beauty
Stop, what's this move called?
Beauty reflected in the mirror
Reflected in the mirror, is it performed like this?
Hmph, learning these aberrant things

chinese:
对面河边一只凤 像个可怜虫
笑人家是凤不是龙
凤有什么不好
我们家就少了一只凤
english:
In front, on the river bank is a phoenix, resembling a pitiful worm
Laughing at her for being a phoenix (female) instead of a dragon (male)
What's bad about being a phoenix?
Our family is just missing a phoenix

chinese:
我要的是条龙 继承我的武当剑法
可是你妈的肚子 就是不争气
生来生去都是凤 凤 凤
生凤也不全是妈的错
english:
What I want is a dragon (male) to succeed my Wudang sword style
But your mother's stoach is simply too disappointing
Giving birth again and again it's always phoenix (female), phoenix, phoenix
Giving birth to phoenixes isn't all mom's fault

chinese:
爹 你可以把我当龙
我会把武当剑练好的
english:
Dad, you can treat me as a dragon (male)
I will succeed the Wudang sword style

chinese:
你最听话
十八年前
你还在你妈肚皮里的时候
我就给你取了个名字叫生龙 可惜
可惜什么呀 爹
可惜生下来的 还是只凤
english:
You are my best child
18 years ago
When you were still in your mother's stomach
I picked a name for you: "Shenglong", it's a pity
What's a pity, dad?
It's a pity that what was born, was still a phoenix (female)

chinese:
凤 迟早都要飞走的
不会 爹 我是龙 不会飞走的
非龙非凤的 能飞到哪儿去
你
english:
Phoenixes (females), will all fly away sooner or later (tradition of sons staying in the family and daughters marrying into other families)
That won't happen, dad, I'm a dragon (male), I won't fly away
Neither a dragon nor a phoenix, where can you fly?
You

chinese:
将来你们飞到哪家都行
就不许飞到龙家
想娶我的女儿
偷我的武当剑法 做梦
天下功夫出少林 放屁
只有武当剑法 才是天下无双
english:
In the future you all can fly (marry) to any family
Except for the Long family
They want to marry my daughter
To steal my Wudang sword style, they're dreaming!
All Kungfu under the heavens originate from Shaolin, bullshit!
Only the Wudang sword style is truly matchless under the heavens

chinese:
今后 你们只许学剑
谁也不许偷学少林功夫
english:
From now on, all of you are unly permited to learn the sword
Nobody is allowed to secretly learn Shaoling Kungfu

chinese:
不许停 练
再练一百遍
谁偷懒 没饭吃
我宁愿不吃饭了
不成 练
english:
No stopping. Practice!
Practice another 100 times
Whoever is lazy, will have nothing to eat
I'd rather just not eat then
Unacceptable. Practice!

chinese:
真是个王八蛋
你骂谁
我刚才看见你的嘴里也吧吧吧
我也看见了
哦 难道你们都没有吧吧吧
我们没有不承认啊
好 男子汉大丈夫 有胆量的骂出声来
啊 在这儿骂呀
一 二 三
爹是王八蛋
再来一次啊 爹是王八蛋
一 二 三 爹是王八蛋
爹来了
english:
What a son of a bitch
Who are you cursing?
A moment ago I saw your mouth was also muttering (bababa)
I also saw it
Oh, don't tell me that you all weren't muttering
We didn't not admit it
Alright, as a true man, if you have the guts then curse out loud
Ah? Curse right here?
One two three
Dad is a son of a bitch
One more time, dad is a son of a bitch
One two three, dad is a son of a bitch
Dad is coming

chinese:
今天是叫你们练累了
好好睡一觉吧
english:
Today it's true I made you exhausted from practice
Sleep well

chinese:
你们又搞什么鬼了
爹 我们对不起你
我们刚才骂了你
骂我？骂我什么 再骂给我听听
爹 我们骂给你听 你可别发火啊
行 骂吧 痛痛快快的骂吧
你喊一二三吧
一 二 三
爹是王八蛋
大声点儿
爹是王八蛋
啊？
爹 你说过不发火么
english:
What trouble have you all made again?
Dad, we've wronged you
A moment ago we cursed you
Cursed me? How did you curse me? Curse again for me to hear
Dad, if we curse for you to hear, you mustn't get angry
Alright, go ahead and curse, curse to your heart's content
You call one two three
One two three
Dad is a son of a bitch
Say it a little louder
Dad is a son of a bitch
What?
Dad, you said you wouldn't get angry

chinese:
我并不是你们的爹
爹 你是我们的爹
如果你们的爹 当年身上有功夫
就不会家毁人亡了
十年前秃鹰山的强盗抢劫你们家的村庄
你们爹娘 死的死 伤的伤
我和弟弟二龙从少林寺学艺回乡
路见不平 拼死相救
english:
Dad, I'm not truly the father of you all
Dad, you are our dad
If your fathers, that year, were trained in kungfu
Then they wouldn't have had their homes destroyed and lives taken
Ten years ago the bandits of Tuying mountain pillaged the village of your families
Your parents were killed or injured
I and my little brother Erlong were returning home after learing skills from the Shaolin Temple
On the road we saw this injustice, and tried our utmost to help

chinese: 救命啊 救命啊
english: Save me! Save me!

chinese:
大哥 怎么样
没事 快 快上车
english:
Big brother, are you okay?
I'm alright. Quickly, get on the vehicle

chinese:
拼死也要把孩子们救出去
好
english:
Even at the cost of our life we have to rescue the children
Alright

chinese:
追
大哥
快追
给我杀
我打瞎了秃鹰的一只眼睛
把你们救了出来
快十年了
把你们八个从小拉扯大
真不容易啊
那我们以后叫师父 还是叫爹呀
哎 当然叫爹了
叫爹 当然叫爹了
爹 你请上坐
爹爹在上 请受孩儿们一拜
爹 你辛辛苦苦把我们养大
你是我们的亲爹
爹 你还教我们少林功夫
你对我们真是恩 恩
恩重如山
恩重如山
请再受孩儿们一拜吧
好 好 起来吧
你们一个个都是乖孩子
爹
english:
Chase them down
Big brother
Hurry, after them!
Kill them for me!
I blinded one of Tuying's eyes
And rescued you all from that place
It's been almost 10 years
Raising you eight
Was truly not easy
Then from now on should we call you Shifu, or dad?
Ai, of course we call him dad
Call him dad, of course we call him dad
Dad, please sit
Father above, please accept a bow from us children
Dad, you painstakingly raised us
You are our true father
Dad, you also taught is Shaolin kungfu
To us, your kindness, kindness
Kindness is as heavy as a mountain
Your kindness is as heavy as a mountain
Please accept another bow from us children
Alright, get up
You are all good children
Dad

chinese:
最捣蛋的就是你
爹 最捣蛋的是我 你罚我吧
english:
The one that causes the most trouble, is you
Dad, the one that causes the most trouble is me, go ahead and punish me

chinese:
哎呀！
痛不痛
不痛 我早就让你扎惯了
干细活 爹笨手笨脚的
你们就是少了一个妈妈
english:
Aiya!
Does it hurt?
It doesn't hurt, I'm already accustomed to getting pricked by you
For delicate work, your father is clumsy
What you all are missing is a mother

chinese:
他妈的 十年了
这瞎眼之仇 几时才能报
english:
Damn it! It's been ten years
When can I get revenge for this blind eye?

chinese:
老大 凭咱众兄弟现在的功夫
还怕对付不了几个少林小子
动手吧
对 老大 凤村可是块肥肉啊
干它一下 哥们儿起码可以风流十年八载的
鲍笙凤那几个小妞
眉毛弯弯 腰儿细细 屁股大大的
你以为我两眼全瞎吗
龙河这边儿是少林正宗
那边儿是武当嫡传
我们对付得了吗
老大
有屁快放
老二 有何妙计
说出来听听
少林 武当 自古水火不容
只要想办法 让他们自相残杀
这瞎眼之仇 还怕报不了吗
对 对 快说下去
到那时候 保证让弟兄们到鲍家去
杀鸡宰牛 共享温柔
english:
Leader, with the kungfu of all us brothers
Are we still afraid we can't deal with some Shaolin punks?
Let's make a move
That's right, leader, the Feng village is a piece of fat meat
If we pillage there, we brothers can live promiscuously for eight or ten years
Bao Shengfen's girls
Have curvy eyebrows, slim waists, and big butts
Do you think both my eyes are blind?
On this side of the Long river is a Shaolin orthodox school
On that side is a Wudang direct successor
Can we handle it?
Leader
Out with it!
Second eldest, what brilliant scheme do you have
Let us hear it
Shaolin and Wudang, from ancient times are as incompatible as fire and water
As long as we come up with a way to make them destroy one another
You can surely get revenge for your blinded eye
Right, right, quickly, go on
At that time, I guarantee we brothers can go to the Bao family
To slaughter the chickens and cows (men), and enjoy together the gentle and soft (women)

chinese:
信士鲍笙凤
一向乐善好施
不求荣华富贵
只望得一男丁
可惜九索皆凤
今奉上薄酒素果
聊表心意
他日若得神明保佑
鲍家有龙
定当金猪厚礼
酬谢神恩
对啊 菩萨也不喜欢老是吃素
english:
I, believer Bao Shengfeng
Am always kind and charitable
I don't request for glory or wealth
But only hope to have a son
But nine times all resulted in phoenixes (daughters)
Today I offer my meager wine and plain fruit
To slightly express my wish
Another day if I obtain God's blessing
And my Bao family has a dragon (son)
I will certainly offer gold and pigs 
To thank your divine favor
That's right, even Bodhisattva doesn't like to always eat vegetarian

chinese:
道长 你看我像不像生不出儿子的那种人啊
居士有超凡入圣之身
但屡次求龙得凤
实与风水有关
请道长指点迷津
english:
Daoist priest, do I look like the type of person who can't have sons?
You have an exceedingly saintly body
But repeatedly wishing for a dragon (son) and obtaining a phoenix (son)
It's related to fengshui
Doaist priest, please advise me

chinese:
听说武当剑怎么利害
谁也没见他耍过
就是 人家少林派就不同
刀 枪 棍 棒什么都肯教
怪不得都说天下功夫出少林
对
english:
Although I heard about how great the Wudang sword style is
Nobody's seen him display it
Exactly, the Shaolin sect is different
Be it the saber, spear, or rod, they're willing to teach anything
No wonder everyone says "All martial arts under heaven originate from Shaolin"
Right

chinese:
伯父
诶 怎么叫伯父 不叫岳父
牛哥看上了哪只凤
去 去 去
english:
Uncle
Ei, why do you call him uncle instead of father-in-law?
Which phoenix (female) did brother Niu take a fancy to?
Knock it off

chinese:
老是生不出龙
难道是天生异形
你们
施主息怒 办正事要紧
english:
He's always unable to produce a dragon (son)
Could he be an inherent abnormality?
You all
Mister please calm down, there are important matters at hand

chinese:
福人居福地
福地居福人
english:
A persopering person resides in a prospering land
A prospering land houses a prospering person

chinese:
好一块龙阳之地啊
龙当门者大吉昌
理应早生贵子
是啊是啊
嗯？
道长 有何不妥
对面山头什么人
english:
What a wonderful land of dragon yang energy
Those with a dragon door are greatly prosperous
Logic dictates that you should have long given birth to a son
Right
Huh?
Daost priest, is something wrong?
What people live on the mountains ahead?

chinese:
三龙哥
龟 蛋
什么 你们骂三龙哥龟蛋
不 我请三龙哥吃烤乌龟
还有我的鸟蛋
english:
Brother Sanlong
Turtle egg
What? Are you guys calling brother Sanlong a turtle egg?
No, I'm inviting brother Sanlong to eat roast turtle
And my bird egg

chinese:
今天吃龙肉都没有胃口
你想吃什么 我们给你找
我想要只凤
english:
Today even if I were eating dragon meat I'd have no appetite
What do you want to eat? We'll find it for you
I want a phoenix

chinese: 你当初不该收留他们
english: You shouldn't have offered them shelter

chinese:
如果让大凤姐做我们妈
爹开心
我们又能学到武当剑
那该多好啊
english:
If we could let eldest sister Feng be our mother
Dad would be happy
And we could learn the Wudang sword style
How great would that be

chinese:
爹只有三条半牛
鲍笙凤要我们十条牛
english:
Dad only has three and a half cows
Bao Shengfeng wants 10 cows from us

chinese:
鲍笙凤最喜欢那假小子
她肯美言几句
爹的婚事准有希望
可惜 咱们那天得罪了她
连朋友都做不成
还想攀亲家
english:
Bao Shengfeng likes that tomboy the most
If she were willing to put in a few good words
Dad's marriage would certainly have hope
It's too bad we offended her on that day
We can't even become friends
Let alone getting her to help us become one family

chinese:
全怪你 都怪你
你们没份儿啊
连三龙哥还喷她一脸水呢
我去向她赔礼道歉
english:
It's all your fault
You guys have no share in the blame?
Even brother Sanong sprayed water all over her face
I'll go apologize and make amends

chinese:
诶 你就这样去见她呀
准又打起来
是啊 得体面点儿 对啊
对 佛靠金装 人靠衣装
去把爹的新郎装偷来
走啊
english:
Ei, you're going to see her like this?
You'll surely start fighting again
Right, you have to be more dignified
Yes, Buddha relies on gold for adornment, people rely on clothes
Let's go steal dad's groom suit
Let's go

chinese:
怎么爹的新郎裤那么大呀
人逢喜事
那阵子爹一定是心广体胖
english:
Why is dad's groom pants so big
When a person comes across a happy occassion (wedding)
In that time period, dad will certainy be big-hearted and fat-bodied

chinese:
诶诶诶 别乱搞
爹的新浪衣要弄坏了
我也没命了
english:
Ei ei ei, don't mess around with it
If dad's groom suit is ruined
My life will also be forfeit

chinese: 我们家最漂亮的就是这一件了
english: Our familys most beautiful piece of clothing is this one

chinese:
不伦不类的
这怎能给假小子一个好印象呢
这个 你放心
到时候啊 我自会风度翩翩
嘿 小姐 小生有礼
有礼
english:
It's out of place
How can this give that tomboy a good impression?
About this, rest assured
When the time comes, I'll definitely be elegant and graceful
Hei, young lady, this young scholar greets you
Greetings

chinese:
天上的鸟儿 啰 成双的飞
河中的鱼儿 啰 成对的游
妹盼阿哥来作伴
太阳落山悄悄候
english:
The birds in the sky form pairs to fly
The fish in the river form pairs to swim
This little sister longs for big brother's company
The sun sets below the mountain, I wait quietly

chinese:
诶 你们看
二叔真是色胆包天了
给鲍笙凤看见
就前功尽弃了
你不怕二叔的拳头啊
english:
Hey, look
2nd eldest uncle is truly bold in his lust
If this were seen by Bao Shengfeng
Our plans would be ruined
Aren't you afraid of 2nd eldest uncle's fists?

chinese:
就知道傻笑
歌不会唱
难道话都不会讲了吗
啊 我 给你
啊 给你妈的
english:
You just know how to laugh foolishly
You can't sing
Don't tell me you don't even know how to talk anymore?
Ah, I, give you 
Ah, it's for your mother

chinese:
二姐 难道你忘了爹的嘱咐吗
还不回家去
english:
Second eldest sister, could it be you've forgotten what dad said?
You'd better return home immediately

chinese:
不许过来 回去
一脚牛屎
不认识字吗
english:
Don't come over, go back
Foot covered in cow dung
Can't you read?

chinese:
这 你 你
你想怎么样
气死我了
你以为咬牙切齿 张眉突眼
我就怕你了吗 来啊
english:
This, you, you
What're you gonna do?
You've pissed me off to death
Did you believe that if you gnash your teeth and express your anger
That I'd be afraid of you? Bring it

chinese:

干嘛

快回去吧
哼
